content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, nice to meet you. Let's negotiate the price of the apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see, so you want to discuss the price. The apartment is in high demand due to its location and condition. I was thinking of 800 Euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's too low for me. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Yi-Nuo Wang. Since the apartment is in high demand, I could ask for more. Let's say 850 Euros a month.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still too low. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Alright, Yi-Nuo Wang. Considering the demand, I could ask for 900 Euros a month. It's a fair price for the apartment's condition and location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: That's still too low. I want to get the highest price possible. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Okay, Yi-Nuo Wang. This is the last price I can offer. Let's say 950 Euros a month. It's a good price for the apartment's condition and location.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1000 Euros a month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, Yi-Nuo Wang, but 1000 Euros is too high. I can't go beyond 950 Euros. If you agree to this price, I will accept it. Otherwise, we have to terminate the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the price is not meeting my requirement.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
